etymologies: mid 16th century: via Latin from Greek gnōmōn ‘indicator, carpenter's square’ (related to gignōskein ‘know’)

definitions: the projecting piece on a sundial that shows the time by the position of its shadow.
shortDefinitions: projecting piece on sundial that shows time by position of its shadow

definitions: the part of a parallelogram left when a similar parallelogram has been taken from its corner.
shortDefinitions: part of parallelogram left when similar parallelogram has been taken from its corner
